author: pk910
content:
Heya,
I'm building a lightweight version of the beaconchain explorer. 
If anyone is looking for a CL explorer for devnet-8, I'm running a early version here:  https://beaconlight-devnet8.pk910.de/
Happy for feedback ðŸ™‚ 
The UI is mostly copied from beaconcha.in. 
The focus was more on getting the block details directly from a standard CL RPC and making the explorer easier to run.
